titlestmt.subtitle: An Inventory of Holdings at the Litchfield Historical Society
titlestmt.author: Collection Description/Finding Aid prepared by Leith Johnson.

publicationstmt.p: © Copyright 2009 Litchfield Historical Society. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was encoding in EAD by Archon 2.22 from an SQL database source on May 19th, 2010.

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Records relating to Litchfield Bancorp. Founded in 1850 as The Litchfield Savings Society, the name was changed in 1952 to The Litchfield Savings Bank, and changed again in 1984 to Litchfield Bancorp. The items are the bank's cashbook, 1850-1864; record book, containing board of directors minutes and other records, 1850-1889; an 1850 incorporation document; a list, possibly of directors, 1874; an excerpt from an 1880 public act related to savings banks; and a scrapbook documenting the bank's 150th birthday celebration and commemorative recipe booklets, both 2000.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Litchfield Bancorp was founded in 1850 as The Litchfield Savings Society. In 1952, the bank changed its name to The Litchfield Savings Bank, and changed it again in 1984 to Litchfield Bancorp.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Records relating to Litchfield Bancorp. Founded in 1850 as The Litchfield Savings Society, the name was changed in 1952 to The Litchfield Savings Bank, and changed again in 1984 to Litchfield Bancorp. The items are the bank's cashbook, 1850-1864; record book, containing board of directors minutes and other records, 1850-1889; an 1850 incorporation document; a list, possibly of directors, 1874; an excerpt from an 1880 public act related to savings banks; and a scrapbook documenting the bank's 150th birthday celebration and commemorative recipe booklets, both 2000.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some unpublished materials authored or otherwise produced by the creator(s) of this collection are in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Litchfield Bancorp Records (2000-24-0), Litchfield Historical Society, Helga J. Ingraham Memorial Library, P.O. Box 385, 7 South Street, Litchfield, Connecticut, 06759

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Litchfield Historical Society from Litchfield Bancorp on 01/01/2000.

odd.head: Other Information
odd.p: This collection was processed with support from the National Historical Publications and Records Commission (NHPRC).
